body: Can anyone tell me what all the other ips for avicus are? The only ones i remember no one's playing on.
body_tagged: Can anyone tell me what all the other ips for avicus are? The only ones i remember no one's playing on.
title: Alternate IPs?

replies.body: They all do the same thing...
replies.body_tagged: They all do the same thing...

replies.body: I mean for specific games like cronus.avic.us apollo.avic.us that kind of thing
replies.body_tagged: I mean for specific games like cronus.avic.us apollo.avic.us that kind of thing

replies.body: Just do (server name).avic.us for example: mczone02.avic.us or apollo.avic.us
replies.body_tagged: Just do (server name).avic.us for example: mczone02.avic.us or apollo.avic.us

replies.body: Oh i don't remember those either, that's what i'm trying to figure out.
replies.body_tagged: Oh i don't remember those either, that's what i'm trying to figure out.

replies.body: My problem is the only server names i remember i can't connect to or no one isplaying on those
replies.body_tagged: My problem is the only server names i remember i can't connect to or no one isplaying on those

replies.body: Some people are on cronus
replies.body_tagged: Some people are on cronus

replies.body: I cant connect to cronus for some reason.
replies.body_tagged: I cant connect to cronus for some reason.

replies.body: Also what servers are people playing on?
replies.body_tagged: Also what servers are people playing on?

replies.body: Nobody knows! just do /server mczone01, /server mczone02 and so on. Same with /server nebula01, /server nebula02 and so on. then /server apollo, /server iris, /server cronus, /server tellus. If you find a game be happy! You only have to connect to a server and follow the steps above.
replies.body_tagged: Nobody knows! just do /server mczone01, /server mczone02 and so on. Same with /server nebula01, /server nebula02 and so on. then /server apollo, /server iris, /server cronus, /server tellus. If you find a game be happy! You only have to connect to a server and follow the steps above.

replies.body: Thank you i forgot the command to switch between servers i had to keep disconnecting and reconnecting to a different server.
replies.body_tagged: Thank you i forgot the command to switch between servers i had to keep disconnecting and reconnecting to a different server.

replies.body: Or you know you could connect to a hub like a normal person and check who is playing what
replies.body_tagged: Or you know you could connect to a hub like a normal person and check who is playing what
